title: Synchronization bug?
body:
by **mingjie.xing**: 
The link to a program on play.golang.org.

1. http://play.golang.org/p/MbS39APz3b

What is the expected output?

Doc (http://golang.org/ref/mem) says, "calling twoprint causes "hello,
world" to be printed twice".

What do you see instead?

[no output]

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

gccgo

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go version go1
